Assessing the re-introduction of Aedes aegypti using a process-based population dynamical model.” Ecological Informatics. doi:10.1016/j.ecoinf.2020.101180, https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S1574954120301308?via%3Dihub.
